questions.question: Which of the following is an acquired brain injury (ABI)?
What is the cause of an Open Head Injury?
options: Lack of oxygen in the brain
A blunt blow to the head

questions.question: What happens during a Coup Contre-Coup
options: The brain undergoes a lot of rotational forces
A foreign object penetrates the skull
The brain impacts the front and back of the skull
questions.answer: The brain impacts the front and back of the skull

questions.question: What kind of injury causes neurons to stretch and tear?
What happens to the brain after an injury?
